channel.title: Server admins! Look here! I may be your next host!
channel.description:
Ok. First of all idlike to say that i have DSL 512kb. So i really can hold many players without lag. I can host 24/7 cuz i keep my comp always ON. So 24/7 is supported
_What do you need_ -Well idlike to have atleast 20 players online at one time. Also custom addons are VERY supported. I mean that you have added something yourself not like you have just changed some texts from project 14 or sumething :|. . . . Also it would be good that you have atleast forums of your private server.
_What do i need_ -I dont need money or something.. I just need admins to server and respect. Nothing else.
So post here EVERYTHING about your server. Then i pick the best one and host it. Be fast tho.. if i find good server from first post i take it.
K ty bai
MSN: SmirkkeliErtzi@gmail.com Email: same as MSN

item.title: Server admins! Look here! I may be your next host!
item.dc:creator: @xx_ciao_xx imanubnoob
item.description:
@xx_ciao_xx wrote:

ill let you host my server add my email anthonytarantola9@hotmail.com
you can switch between two sources, bloodsportscape source or hiyascape source, right now the server is only hamachi thats why im looking for a host like this, im having one problem with commands though, im trying to figure out how ::givemod and ::giveadmin work, same as ::ipban for ip i have to go in the files and then write down their ip and put it on banned ips. Thats pretty much the only down part

Read full topic

item.title: Server admins! Look here! I may be your next host!
item.dc:creator: @CJg CJg
item.description:
@CJg wrote:

[quote=“Ertzi, post:9, topic:9574”][quote author=Wolfeyes217 link=topic=13769.msg157979#msg157979 date=1155690770]
So you want us to send you our hard worked on server so you can host it…? sounds like a rip off to me… and also
DSL 512kb

isnt alot, I have 740kb dsl and mine lags with 25 people
[/quote]
omg… it seems that none of u understand… I would HOST IT… its still your server but i COULD host it… so u dont have to be hoster… u can be game owner and best admin but i would like admin access too… Are u serious guys that u dont understand this :S[/quote]
Im not sure you understand that it sounds like you just wanna leech someones source…just make your own then your the “best admin”

Read full topic

item.title: Server admins! Look here! I may be your next host!
item.dc:creator: @defyboy defyboy
item.description:
@defyboy wrote:

[quote=“Wolfeyes217, post:8, topic:9574”]So you want us to send you our hard worked on server so you can host it…? sounds like a rip off to me… and also
DSL 512kb

isnt alot, I have 740kb dsl and mine lags with 25 people[/quote]

Runescape uses fuck all bandwidth. The problem is that 512kb DSL is probably 512kb downstream but only 128kb upstream.

Read full topic
